item.title: Guillermo Del Toro and Jacob Elordi Break Down in Tears as ‘Frankenstein’ Wows Venice Film Festival With 14-Minute Standing Ovation
item.description: The ’Frankenstein’ auteur was joined on the Lido by his stars Oscar Isaac, Jacob Elordi, Christoph Waltz, Mia Goth and others for Saturday’s red carpet world premiere.

item.title: Netflix’s Italian Takeover: Streamer Brings 3 Starry Titles and Top Executives to Venice Film Festival
item.description: Expected on the Lido this year are Ted Sarandos, Bela Bajaria, Dan Lin and awards guru Lisa Taback to support films from Guillermo del Toro, Noah Baumbach and Kathryn Bigelow.

item.title: YES Scholars Confirms Ted Sarandos, Nicole Avant, Shaboozey and Will Arnett for Milestone Gala
item.description: The high-profile couple will be honored at the 25th anniversary gala at Bel-Air Country Club on Sept. 4, singled out for “a long-standing commitment to education and meaningful impact on communities.”

item.title: Seth Rogen Admits He Was Tripping on Mushrooms During His Marc Maron Podcast Interview
item.description: And the 2013 expereince was the inspiration for ‘The Studio’ finale.
